changes.change: Reworked entire w29 toolkit for iOS 12+ compatibility without extra dependencies
Unified backup and restore commands with improved user confirmation
Added detailed warnings to prevent accidental system damage
Improved network, model, and iOS version detection using native tools
Introduced modsysps command for modifying system plist keys
Added backup (bsysps) and restore (rsysps) commands for system plist
Implemented confirmation prompts for dangerous operations
Initial public release of w29 command toolkit
Basic device info, respring, safemode, and cache clean commands
